mapper.insert: insert all into userfollow(userid,follow) values(#{userid},#{follow}) into userfollower(userid,follower) values(#{follow},#{userid}) select * from dual
mapper.select: select follow from userfollow where userid = #{userid} order by userid
select follower from userfollower where userid = #{userid} order by userid
select count(*) from userfollow where userid = #{userid} and follow = #{follow}
select count(*) from userfollower where userid = #{userid} and follower = #{follower}
